attributes.action: stop providing houses to asylum seekers
attributes.additional_details: Asylum seeks seems to be a big problem Britain is facing in recent years. A lot of migrants comes from war zone to Britain and finally wins the right to stay in the UK and the government has to provide housing and other expenses for them at the cost of the tax payers. It really hurts when a genuine tax payer applies for some benefits and is turned down and the asylum seekers gets everything.
